thread.title: Bindi Irwin gets perfect score on Dancing with the Stars with Dirty Dancing move
thread.title_full: Bindi Irwin gets perfect score on Dancing with the Stars with Dirty Dancing move

author: Michael Lallo
title: Bindi Irwin gets perfect score on Dancing with the Stars with Dirty Dancing move
text:
Click to play video Return to video Video settings Please Log in to update your video settings
Video will begin in 5 seconds.
Don't play Play now More video Recommended Replay video Return to video Video settings Please Log in to update your video settings
Bindi Irwin nails Dirty Dancing lift Bindi Irwin earned a perfect score when she and Dancing with the Stars partner Derek Hough performed the famous final scene in Dirty Dancing.
PT1M36S http://www.canberratimes.com.au/action/externalEmbeddedPlayer?id=d-44umx 620 349 October 20, 2015 Autoplay On Off Video feedback Video settings Is Bindi the female role model we need? Bindi's emotional tribute to her father Bindi wows with Crocodile Rock Nobody puts Bindi in the corner.
The teen star scored a perfect 40 – and a standing ovation – on the US version of Dancing with the Stars after re-creating Dirty Dancing's famous "lift".
Time of her life: Bindi Irwin re-creates Dirty Dancing's famous "lift" scene with Derek Hough. Photo: Supplied 
And all she had to do to get it was overcome a stinky lake, floating poo and a partner who'd never done the dance move.
Advertisement The 17-year-old TV presenter and conservationist – daughter of the late crocodile hunter Steve Irwin – has proven a hit with American viewers. In an earlier episode, she moved the studio audience to tears with a tribute to her father.
On Monday night, viewers watched Irwin and her dance partner Derek Hough perform their routine in a lake – just as Patrick Swayze's Johnny and Jennifer Grey's Baby did in the 1987 hit film.
Jennifer Grey and Patrick Swayze in Dirty Dancing . Photo: Supplied 
@BindiIrwin #DWTS Patrick Swayze would be proud of that. Good job on the lift!
— Taryn Sullivan (@Taryn_Sullivan) October 20, 2015 Unfortunately, the water was a little, erm, fragrant.
"There's no way it smelled this bad for Johnny and Baby!" Irwin said.
Bindi and Derek realise they've achieved a perfect score. Photo: Supplied 
@BindiIrwin You were PHENOMENAL and TOTALLY did Dirty Dancing proud!
— Brenda Wilkins (@Angeleyezs1026) October 20, 2015 At this point, Hough noticed something suspicious bobbing past: "It looks like a piece of poo."
After a few inadvertent splashes, they nailed it. Then they repeated it on the dance floor, to the sound of (I've Had) The Time Of My Life .
'There's no way it smelled this bad for Johnny and Baby': Bindi and Derek rehearse. Photo: Supplied 
Irwin's little brother Bob was among those cheering in the audience, while viewers praised the pair on social media.
Nobody puts Bindi in a corner. @BindiIrwin & @derekhough - you did @JenniferGrey & Patrick Swayze proud! #TeamCrikey #DirtyDancing #DWTS 
— Jennifer Parsons (@jen_parsons04) October 20, 2015 Judges Carrie Ann Inaba, Julianne Hough and Australian superstar Olivia Newton-John each gave them a perfect 10.
The original lake scene in Dirty Dancing . Photo: Supplied 
Finally, it was Bruno Tonioli's turn.
"What do you think?" he shouted. "Ten!"
